Attend

Join Us In-Person on May 21, 2024!

Date
May 21, 2024
Time
7:30 am - 4:00 pm ET
Location

The St. Regis Washington DC | 923 Black Lives Matter Plz NW, Washington, DC 20006

Travel

Parking: Valet parketing is available for a rate of $64.00. Please note, parking is covered by the event.

 

Metro: The nearest metro station to The St. Regis Washington, D.C. is Farragut West Metrorail Station (Blue/Orange/Silver). It’s a 5 min walk away from the St. Regis.

Cost

The event is free to attend.

Additional Note

Attire: Business Casual
